Description: A planned process with the objective to produce information about the material entity that is the evaluant, by physically examining it or its proxies.[OBI_0000070]
A thing made or adapted for a particular purpose, especially a piece of mechanical or electronic equipment"
Module for next generation sequencing assays

Type of submitted metadata

Patient, 
scRNA-seq Assay
A type of Information Content Entity specific to OS
REQUIRED: Name of a file
REQUIRED: Format of a file (e.g. txt, csv, fastq, bam, etc.)
HTAN biological entity; bio entity can be a sample, slide, aliquot, analyte, etc.
REQUIRED: ID associated with this biosample; e.g. S1, S2,..., etc.
Individual biomedical demographics attributes
Requires: Patient ID,  Year Of Birth,  Vital Status, Treatment Anatomic Site, Treatment Type, Treatment Effect, Treatment Outcome, Treatment Intent Type, Component

Description: REQUIRED: ID associated with a patient: e.g. P1, P2,..., etc.
REQUIRED: The survival state of the person registered on the protocol.
Valid Values: Status Alive, Status Dead, Status Unknown, Status Not Reported

Description: A patient has died
REQUIRED IF Vital Status Dead: Text term to identify the cause of death for a patient.
Valid Values: Cancer Related, Cardiovascular Disorder NOS, End-stage Renal Disease, Infection, Not Cancer Related, Renal Disorder NOS, Spinal Muscular Atrophy, Surgical Complications, Toxicity, Not Reported, Unknown

Description: REQUIRED: The text term used to describe the pathologic effect a treatment(s) had on the tumor.
Valid Values: Complete Necrosis (No Viable Tumor), Incomplete Necrosis (Viable Tumor Present), No Necrosis, Unknown, Not Reported

Description: REQUIRED: Text term to identify the reason for the administration of a treatment regimen. [Manually-curated]
Valid Values: Adjuvant, Cancer Control, Cure, Neoadjuvant, Palliative, Prevention, Unknown, Not Reported

Description: REQUIRED: Text term that describes the patient's final outcome after the treatment was administered.
Valid Values: Complete Response, Mixed Response, No Measurable Disease, No Response, Partial Response, Persistent Disease, Progressive Disease, Stable Disease, Treatment Ongoing, Treatment Stopped Due to Toxicity, Very Good Partial Response, Unknown, Not Reported

Description: REQUIRED: Text term that describes the kind of treatment administered.
Valid Values: Ablation Cryo,Ablation Ethanol Injection,Ablation Microwave,Ablation NOS,Ablation Radiofrequency,Ablation Radiosurgical,Ancillary Treatment,Antiseizure Treatment,Bisphosphonate Therapy,Blinded Study Treatment Unknown,Brachytherapy High Dose,Brachytherapy Low Dose,Brachytherapy NOS,Chemoembolization,Chemoprotectant,Chemotherapy,Concurrent Chemoradiation,Cryoablation,Embolization,Ethanol Injection Ablation,External Beam Radiation,Hormone Therapy,I-131 Radiation Therapy,Internal Radiation,Immunotherapy (Including Vaccines),Isolated Limb Perfusion (ILP),Organ Transplantation,Other,Pharmaceutical Therapy NOS,Pleurodesis,Radiation 2D Conventional,Radiation 3D Conformal,Radiation Combination,Radiation Cyberknife,Radiation External Beam,Radiation Implants,Radiation Intensity-Modulated Radiotherapy,Radiation Internal,Radiation Proton Beam,Radiation Radioisotope,Radiation Stereotactic/Gamma Knife/SRS,Radiation Systemic,Radiation Therapy NOS,Radioactive Iodine Therapy,Radioembolization,Radiosensitizing Agent,Stem Cell Treatment,Stem Cell Transplantation Autologous,Stem Cell Transplantation Double Autologous,Stem Cell Transplantation Allogeneic,Stem Cell Transplantation Non-Myeloablative,Stem Cell Transplantation Syngenic,Stem Cell Transplantation Haploidentical,Stem Cell Transplantation NOS,Stereotactic Radiosurgery,Steroid Therapy,Surgery,Targeted Molecular Therapy,Unknown,Not Reported

Description: REQUIRED: Process which results in the creation of a library from fragments of DNA using cloning vectors or oligonucleotides with the role of adaptors [OBI_0000711]
Valid Values:
Smart-seq2, Smart-SeqV4, 10xV1, 10xV2, 10xV3,
10xV3.1, CEL-seq2, Drop-seq, inDropsV2, inDropsV3, TruDrop

Description: REQUIRED: Number of days since sample received in lab: proxy for the date that the libraries were prepared for sequencing
REQUIRED: A platform is an object_aggregate that is the set of instruments and software needed to perform a process [OBI_0000050]
Valid Values: Illumina Next Seq 500, Illumina Next Seq 2500, Illumina NovaSeq 6000

Description: REQUIRED: An oligo to which new deoxyribonucleotides can be added by DNA polymerase [SO_0000112]. The type of primer used for reverse transcription, e.g. oligo-dT or random primer. This allows users to identify content of the cDNA library input e.g. enriched for mRNA
REQUIRED: Number of cells loaded/placed on plates
REQUIRED: A set of known synthetic RNA molecules with known sequence that are added to the cell lysis mix
REQUIRED: The source of the input nucleic molecule
Valid Values: Single Cell, Bulk Cell, Single Nucleus, Bulk Nuclei

Description: REQUIRED: Indicate if library preparation was based on revived frozen cells.
REQUIRED: The method by which cells are isolated into individual reaction containers at a single cell resolution (e.g. wells, micro-droplets)
Single-cell RNA-seq [EFO_0008913]
Requires: Filename, File Format, Sample ID, Nucleic Acid Source, Single Cell Isolation Method, Library Preparation Date, Library Construction Method, Sequencing Platform, Cryopreserved Cells in Sample, Spike In, Total Number of Input Cells, Component
